name: TGear: test track
description: Are you a fan of TGear’s "Star in a Reasonably Priced Car" segment? Do you like watching celebrities flog the show’s Kia Cee'd (or its Suzuki Liana predecessor) around the track, but think you could do better than Simon Cowell (or at least Steve Coogan) if you ever got the chance? Well you’re in luck! The show has a new video game on its website where you can test your skills and see where you’d fall on the leaderboard.
